item.title: Evalb; Bracket Scoring Parsers
item.description:
A Noob’s Guide to Bracket Scoring

Chances are, if you’re here, you aren’t a complete noob. Though, if you’re like I was before getting involved with this domain of NLP, you might become confused quite quickly. Hopefully this little introduction/tutorial can provide enough guidance to get you started, relativley hassle-free. Maybe this can be considered a curation of resources.

A Quick Primer on Bracket Scoring

Definitions

-Parser:- A parser bla bla bla bla..

Parsers vary; some do this, some do that. They make different kinds of errors and need a standardized way of evaluating them. Otherwise, you get parsers that cheat scores. A parser evaluator that we will talk about is evalb, linked here*. We will get to installing evalb soon enough, but to continue with the definitions..

-Erroneous:-

-Gold:-

-F-Measure:-

-Precision:-

-Recall:-

==========For these definitions and explanations, a strong analogy would be useful ======================================================
